data.message:
Hello there - we've just picked up some of your promotional packs of coke as, believe me, we drink enough of it, and deserve to win a dream holiday.  However, I am disappointed.  You clearly state on the label the following "A Dream holiday every day**"  and the ** is for daily draws with the given dates.
On closer inspection, you believe that a "Dream" holiday is staying half board in a 4 star hotel for 7 nights.  I am afraid that that doesn't come close.  a 5* hotel should be a given, as is full board or all inclusive.  So come on - give everyone the chance to truly win a "dream" holiday rather than one you pretend to be...
